They are used, along with coins and either rock-shell, other hides or bones to make rock-shell, spined or skeletal armour respectively. Dagannoth hides are an item used in the making of Fremennik armour. They are used, along with coins and either rock-shell, other hides or bones to make rock-shell, spined or skeletal armour respectively. Helmets require at least one hide, leggings require two hides, and tops require three hides.

[[File:Dagannoth hide detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Dagannoth hides''' are an item used in the making of [[Fremennik armour]]. They are used, along with [[coins]] and either rock-shell, other hides or [[bones]] to make [[rock-shell armour|rock-shell]], [[spined armour|spined]] or [[skeletal armour]] respectively. Helmets require at least one hide, leggings require two hides, and tops require three hides.
